name: Stragure Software Technologies Pvt Ltd
description:
Stragure was founded by enthusiastic professionals who encompassed considerable expertise and experience in resolving business problems of clients using technology while working on a global services delivery model. Stragure has been consistent in delivering bespoke services to clients from its focused yet inspirational ext-generation talent hubs.
“Stragure” is essentially derived from “Strategies for the Future”. Our company was founded by like-minded friends who had worked together for several years and shared a common vision – to rewrite the strategies for the future so businesses could quickly adapt to changing market dynamics.
Our founding team brings together a passion for excellence and prolific work experience of over 35 years amongst themselves. Since inception, Stragure has moved from strength to strength delivering enterprise products and bespoke application development services to global organizations. Ever since, the Stragure Story continues to be driven by passion, customer satisfaction, and innovation.
